name: RC Drone Flight Simulator 3D
description:
Fly remote controlled drones and collect stars at three different places: Office, Supermarket and Warehouse.

There are five drones. Collect diamonds from special locations and unlock all of them.

Challenge yourself and your friend with addictive drone flight simulation game.

Suitable for children and all ages. Enjoy it on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch.

Have fun !

■Game center support:
Compare your best top score with others in the world.

■Social sharing:
Share your new score and challenge with your friends.
